name: Ruth Gerth
biography: Industrial designer Ruth Gerth married William Gerth, also a designer. Ruth designed extensively for Chase Brass & Copper Company in Waterbury, CT. She designed many objects for the company’s gift line as well as planned the offices, gift shop, and showrooms. Additionally, in 1936 she served as the president of the Artist's Guild, which established and promoted fair practices for the employment of freelance artists.
